sentences.english: One or two small pinholes were all I could find that need touching up.
sentences.chinese: 一个或两个小针孔，都是我可以找到需要润饰。

sentences.english: Surface pinholes caused by gas formed at the mould surface.
sentences.chinese: 因钢锭模表面生成气体而形成的表面针孔。

sentences.english: The existence of pinholes is a general phenomenon on thin gauge aluminium foils.
sentences.chinese: 针孔是厚度较小的铝箔中普遍存在的现象。

sentences.english: Pinhole on shot-hole damage is never structurally significant.
sentences.chinese: 针孔和蛀洞所造成的危害对结构的影响不大。

sentences.english: The pin-hole camera lens is applied to monitoring system.
sentences.chinese: 针孔摄像镜头用于监视系统。

sentences.english: Can be used for any type of camera from film SLR to pinhole to cinematographic.
sentences.chinese: 可用于任何类型的相机从胶片单反针孔到电影。

sentences.english: The die should also be finished off with high quality, hard-chrome, pinhole-free plating.
sentences.chinese: 模具完成时也应该高品质，硬铬，无针孔，电镀。

sentences.english: That his sister likes to sleep in the nude and I have a polaroid camera.
sentences.chinese: 他的姐姐喜欢裸睡而我有一个针孔摄像头。

sentences.english: Special perforation design for adjusting number and location of pinholes.
sentences.chinese: 特殊打孔装置可任意调节针孔数量及位置。

sentences.english: The focal spot, size depend on the pinhole diaphragm diameter of spatial filter.
sentences.chinese: 光斑尺寸和空间滤波系统的针孔光阑直径有关。

sentences.english: The calomel electrode has a small pinhole opening or wick .
sentences.chinese: 甘汞电板上有一个针孔或砂芯。

sentences.english: Pinhole free film. A surface free from any defects.
sentences.chinese: 无针孔的涂膜，没有表面缺陷的表面。

sentences.english: I was checking if there was any hiden cameras.
sentences.chinese: 我检查是否有针孔摄像。

definition: see 注射針|注射针[zhu4 she4 zhen1]
to prick with a needle/to treat by acupuncture
